data.message:
I like your songs, but fuck school???
No, it's wrong.
Totally wrong.
I don't like that way of being too cool.
Tell kids to go to school and be a good person. But pls don't say again that kind of words about school. School is awesome. Every child should go to school.

replies.message: You obviously shouldn't be listening to his music if you can't understand the logic and messages he's been putting out for 13 years now.sorry sir but you're a fuckass

You are the one of kind of people who think that leaving school, do drugs and smoking is cool. And fyi I've been listening the Eminem since last 5 years. although I'm his biggest fan(as I think) but I don't agree with what he has said above. And I didn't find any connection between what Eminem said and what I've said above.
He shouldn't be promoting the message "Fuck school." Especially with how much impact he has.
